text: How do I sort my entries on a listing page? I have a table with event entries, and am using a dynamic page to list them, but need to sort them by the date of the event.
I also need to filter out the events that have passed already.
When creating dynamic pages from a hubdb is there a trick to get these pages to show up to be linked in an Advanced Menu or do you have to type the full url in for each page
You can clone HubDb tables from the UI now using the actions dropdown
FYI: Location Column type hubL print for long/ Lat Long is shown in the error reporting . but the variable is location.lon vs "long" in the object. Might be good to change this
which error reporting are you seeing? We had to name it ‘lon’ because ‘long’ is a reserved word.
